modName: FXAA Post Process Injector v2 tweak for darker night and rea
summary: some result after i spend few hours messing around with Fxaa 2.0
descriptionHtml:
I used Realistic Colors and Real Nights by aLaaa but i still feel that it\'s alittle lack of color so i spended a few hours to tweak and tested with fxaa process injecter v2.0.

REQUIRE:

FXAA post process injecter v2.0 by Retspadez (the file is now in hiden stat for those who dont have it i suggest use google)

Here is my setting with FXAA tool:

 AntiAliasing table:
Fxaa quality u set it depend on your graphic card it the higher value equal to higher antialiasing
AA blur amount keep it at 5
Contrast edge threshold keep it at 7
Dark edge threshold keep it at 5

 PreSharpen table: Leave it deactive

 Bloom table: leave all setting here at 4

 Technicolor: toggle off

 ToneMap:

Gamma set it to 1 for darker night

Exposure keep it at 6

Saturation set it to 6

Bleach Bypass keep it at 3

Defog power keep it at 5

 Sepia table: toggle it off

 Post sharpen : toggle on or off depend on what u like ( me i toggle it off for smoother character face )

CREDIT AND THANKS
thanks to Retspadez for his awesome visual mod
author: Ravenworld
